Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • Room

  • public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is part of "Beewick castle" application. "Beewick castle" is a very simple, text based adventure game. This class is to move move around the map in diferent room.
    Version:
    2008.03.30 + 2013.09.15
    Author:
    Michael Kolling and David J. Barnes + D.Bureau & Elvin Guilloton
